org.nd4j.linalg.ops

Class BaseElementWiseOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.ops.BaseElementWiseOp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementWiseOp
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Abs, BaseTwoArrayElementWiseOp, EqualTo, Exp, Floor, GreaterThan, HardTanh, Identity, LessThan, Log, Max, MaxOut, Negative, Pow, Round, Sigmoid, Sign, Sqrt, Stabilize, Tanh

    public abstract class BaseElementWiseOp
extends Object
implements ElementWiseOp
    Baseline element wise operation so only applyTransformToOrigin has to be implemented. This also handles the ability to perform scalar wise operations vs just a functional transformation
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
